name: The Least of These
description:
No matter what, there's always the choice to help or hurt.

What will you choose?

Controls not described in game:

"M" - toggle music

"R" - restart game

Note:

In the uploaded version there's a bug that prevents the Successful end screen from appearing. :( You can lose just fine though!

Credits:

Programming & Design: Kris24

Backgrounds: Craftpix.net

Music: Kevin MacLeod

From OpenGameArt.org

Character: Clint Bellanger

Portraits: Michele 'Buch' Bucelli

Paper Texture: darkwood

Additional art and sound: Kris24

Built in GameMaker 1.4 (download is a straight executable, no installer)
